name: YoutubePlus
subtitle: YoutubePlus Altstore source.
description:
This is an Altstore source for YoutubePlus.

YoutubePlus is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience, combining YTLite (by @dayanch96) with numerous other tweaks.

For full details on what's included, check the GitHub repository:

https://github.com/YTLitePlus/YTLitePlus

apps.name: YoutubePlus
apps.subtitle: YoutubePlus
apps.versionDescription:
Current YouTube IPA: "19.34.2"  
Current YTLite Version: "5.0.1"  
Current App Compatibility: "iOS/iPadOS 15.0" or later

RELEASE 19.34.2•5.0.1: (2024•09•03)

• Updated Youtube from "19.32.6" to "19.34.2"
• Updated YTLite from "4.0.1" to "5.0.1"

Issues in this Release:
• Touches will not work while bypassing startup popup
• LowContrastMode does not work *(Compatible only with YouTube v17.33.2•v17.38.10)*

Catbox
"z8jg5n.ipa"
apps.localizedDescription:
YTLite with more features!

YTLitePlus is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience, combining YTLite (by @dayanch96) with numerous other tweaks :

• YTLite
• YTUHD
• YouPiP
• YTABConfig
• YouMute
• DontEatMyContent
• Return YouTube Dislikes
• iSponsorBlock
• YouRememberCaption
• YTNoTracking
• YTUnShorts
• YTNoCheckLocalNetwork
• BigYTMiniPlayer
• YTSpeed
• YTHoldForSpeed
• YTVideoOverlay
• YouQuality
• YTNoModernUI
• OLEDDarkmode
• OLDDarkmode
• LowContrastMode
• YTNoSuggestedVideo

Credit

@Balackburn, @bhackel, @Deci8BelioS, @matt911, @arichornloverALT, @Macleykun, @AlexInABox, @SKEIDs, @VictorxD70, @Glenta, @zSaaiq, @MrAlucardDante, @gototheskinny, @asdfzxcvbn, @dayanch96, @ssuesskind, @MiRO92, @qnblackcat, @PoomSmart, @level3tjg, @BandarHL, @Galactic-Dev, @julioverne, @hbang, @Lyvendia, @therealFoxster, @ichitaso, @AhmedBafkir, @CokePokes, @ISnackable

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires access to your microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: YoutubePlus requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YoutubePlus will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
